short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InTags is a powerful LinkedIn profile manager that allows you to save and organize profiles with personalized notes and tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
InTags is a powerful LinkedIn profile manager that allows you to save and organize profiles with personalized notes and tags. Effortlessly keep track of important professionals, add relevant tags, and jot down notes to remember key details. Boost your productivity and never miss an opportunity with InTags.

The latest version introduce a side panel to enhance the user experience and provide a more intuitive way to interact with the extension's features, profile avatars and more!
